data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/42vFebJ0VRnwdemaUOIr7c6Tjo1.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":0,"genres":[{"id":35,"name":"Comedy"},{"id":18,"name":"Drama"}],"homepage":"","id":10757,"imdb_id":"tt0248126","origin_country":["IN","GB"],"original_language":"hi","original_title":"कभी ख़ुशी कभी ग़म","overview":"Years after his father disowns his adopted brother for marrying a woman of lower social standing, a young man goes on a mission to reunite his family.","popularity":24.277,"poster_path":"/lRl7wrJmkOzMTDVYFSIpUcsIjPQ.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":19146,"logo_path":"/5Ff25ornzVNhm5skuAvMAR556NB.png","name":"Dharma Productions","origin_country":"IN"},{"id":1569,"logo_path":"/lvzN86o3jrP44DIvn4SMBLOl9PF.png","name":"Yash Raj Films","origin_country":"IN"},{"id":120404,"logo_path":null,"name":"British Film Commission","origin_country":"GB"},{"id":209899,"logo_path":null,"name":"K3G Films Limited","origin_country":"GB"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"IN","name":"India"},{"iso_3166_1":"GB","name":"United Kingdom"}],"release_date":"2001-12-14","revenue":0,"runtime":209,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"Hindi","iso_639_1":"hi","name":"हिन्दी"},{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"It's all about loving your parents.","title":"Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham","video":false,"vote_average":7.743,"vote_count":527}
